1392050.name: Leap of Champions Demo
1392050.description:
ThThe Demo version of Leap Of Champion features DeathMatch and Team DeathMatch modes and one map to let you try the game.

The available map in a tangled and lush Forest that surrounds 2 highly technological hidden bases. The Demo supports up to 32 players and up to 8 bots per team.
All classes that are featured in the full version of the game (Assault, Medic, Scout and Support) are available for you to try as well as the weapons and perks.
We really believe that's a great way to explore and enjoy the world of Leap Of Champions.

The game is going to be improved soon with new weapons and a whole exclusive new Single Player campaign, so, if you liked our demo, why not adding Leap of Champions in your Wish List!?
